name: KanteiMailClient
description: An automation tool for sending improvement proposals to the Japanese Government(Kantei). This extension works in my web site 'https://quasi-stellar.appspot.com/km.html' that contains many mail templates on improving Japan in terms of Economics, Politics, Laws, Educations and so on. This extension creates buttons that can send requests to Kantei directly by using cross site XMLHTTPRequest. Additionally, it supports for sending requests manually by automatically pushing button to skip pages. This addon includes jQuery library (https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.min.js) to activate the features.
